IAVGExcl Interface Reference

import "IAVGExcl.idl";

List of all members.

Public Attributes

attribute long activeChild

Detailed Description

An exclusive node is a grouping node that only activates one of its children.

Member Data Documentation

attribute long IAVGExcl::activeChild
 

Selects which child is active. -1 for none.
